name: Heart of Depth
title: Shipborne Afterthought: Heart of Depth
desc: "For all deaths are in vain. There is no saving those who indulge in the past."
in_play_description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent Card: Spend 1 less Hydro Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Hydro Dice.
